languages.text: Благодаря великолепному расчету траектории удар пришелся точно в цель. Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов взломал купол мануфакторума и вонзился в громадину крейсера еретиков. Сойдясь в пламенных объятьях, два могучих корабля взлетели на воздух, оставив после себя колоссальный кратер.

traits.locale_text: Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов, на полном ходу прорезал облака смога и вонзился в громадину крейсера еретиков. Сойдясь в пламенных объятьях, два могучих корабля взлетели на воздух, оставив после себя лишь кратер размером с город.

languages.text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.
languages.original_text: Благодаря великолепному расчету траектории удар пришелся точно в цель. Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов взломал купол мануфакторума и вонзился в громадину крейсера еретиков. Сойдясь в пламенных объятьях, два могучих корабля взлетели на воздух, оставив после себя колоссальный кратер.

I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

languages.text: 撞击计算完美无缺，护卫舰沿着预定轨迹，准确地撞在了那艘巡洋舰上。我永远不会忘记当时的那一幕——她的舰体被宏炮的烈焰点燃，笔直地撞入了制造工厂，刺穿了那艘异端巡洋舰的舰身。两艘战舰湮没在炽热的烈焰之中，留下了一个巨大的深坑。
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

traits.locale_text: 撞击计算完美无缺，护卫舰沿着预定轨迹，准确地撞在了那艘巡洋舰上。我永远不会忘记当时的那一幕——她的舰体被宏炮的烈焰点燃，笔直地撞入了制造工厂，刺穿了那艘异端巡洋舰的舰身。两艘战舰湮没在炽热的烈焰之中，留下了一个巨大的深坑。

languages.text: Les calculs étaient parfaitement exacts et le vaisseau a suivi la trajectoire droit jusqu'à sa cible. Je n'oublierai jamais ce spectacle : sa coque, embrasée par les tirs des macro-canons, s'écrasant dans le manufactorum et perforant la carapace du croiseur des hérétiques. Ce brasier dévorant a anéanti les deux vaisseaux, ne laissant derrière lui qu'un gigantesque cratère.
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

traits.locale_text: Les calculs étaient parfaitement exacts et le vaisseau a suivi la trajectoire droit jusqu'à sa cible. Je n'oublierai jamais ce spectacle : sa coque, embrasée par les tirs des macro-canons, s'écrasant dans le manufactorum et perforant la carapace du croiseur des hérétiques. Ce brasier dévorant a anéanti les deux vaisseaux, ne laissant derrière lui qu'un gigantesque cratère.

languages.text: 計算は完璧で、打撃は軌道に沿ってまっすぐ目標に到達した。マクロキャノンの砲火で燃え上がった船体が聖工場の広間に激突し、異端者の巡洋艦の艦隊を貫いた光景は忘れられない。この炎の抱擁は両艦を消し去り、巨大なクレーターを残した。
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

traits.locale_text: 計算は完璧で、打撃は軌道に沿ってまっすぐ目標に到達した。マクロキャノンの砲火で燃え上がった船体が聖工場の広間に激突し、異端者の巡洋艦の艦隊を貫いた光景は忘れられない。この炎の抱擁は両艦を消し去り、巨大なクレーターを残した。

languages.text: El cálculo fue impecable y el ataque siguió una trayectoria perfectamente trazada al objetivo. Nunca olvidaré su casco, ardiendo por los impactos de macrocañones, atravesando los salones del manufactorum y atravesando el crucero de los herejes. Su ardiente abrazo destruyó completamente ambas naves, dejando solo un cráter inmenso.
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

traits.locale_text: El cálculo fue impecable y el ataque siguió una trayectoria perfectamente trazada al objetivo. Nunca olvidaré su casco, ardiendo por los impactos de macrocañones, atravesando los salones del manufactorum y atravesando el crucero de los herejes. Su ardiente abrazo destruyó completamente ambas naves, dejando solo un cráter inmenso.

languages.text: Die Berechnungen waren makellos, und der Angriff folgte der kalkulierten Bahn exakt auf das Ziel. Ich werde nie den Anblick vergessen, wie die Hülle des Schiffs, vom Feuer der Makrokanonen in Brand gesetzt, in die Hallen des Manufactorums krachte und den Rumpf des ketzerischen Kreuzers durchbrach. Diese feurige Umarmung löschte beide Schiffe aus und hinterließ einen kolossalen Krater.
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.

Ich werde nie den Anblick vergessen, wie die Hülle des Schiffs, vom Feuer der Makrokanonen in Brand gesetzt, in die Hallen des Manufactorums krachte und den Rumpf des ketzerischen Kreuzers durchbrach. Diese feurige Umarmung löschte beide Schiffe aus und hinterließ einen kolossalen Krater.

languages.text: Hesaplamalar kusursuzdu; atak, yolundan sapmadan hedefe doğru ilerliyordu. Makro top ateşiyle tutuşan gövdesinin, manufaktorum salonlarına çarparak kâfir gemisinin gövdesini parçalayışını her daim hatırlayacağım. Bu alevli kucaklaşma, iki geminin de varlığını sonlandırdı ve ardında devasa bir krater bıraktı.
languages.original_text: The calculations were flawless, and the strike followed the trajectory straight to its mark. I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls and piercing the body of the heretics' cruiser. This fiery embrace obliterated both of the ships, leaving behind a colossal crater.
